name: icmp-ping
description: Use ICMP packets to efficiently track a host's response time and packet loss

scripts.build-c: mkdir -p build && gcc -I./src src/ping.c test/e2e/ping.c -luv -o build/ping
scripts.run: npm run build && sudo node test/e2e/ping_test.js
scripts.lint: npm run build && eslint index.js lib/**/*.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run cover -- --report lcovonly && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | coveralls

author: Ari Aosved <ari.aosved@gmail.com>
